### Read A Chapter

```{r echo=FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

pdf_link <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/Shadish,%20Cook,%20and%20Campbell%20(2001)%20Chapter%202.pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

readings <- tibble(
  paper <- c("Shadish, W., Cook, T., & Campbell, D. (2002). Construct Validity and External Validity. <i>Experimental and quasi-experimental designs for generalized causal inference</i> (2nd ed., pp. 64-102). Cengage Learning."
  ),
 
  download <- c(
    pdf_link()
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
readings %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Source", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "30em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>% 
  row_spec(0:1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#ffffff", background = "transparent")
```
